attributes.action: Stop Tesco turning England Blue and White! Tesco should be stopped from taking derelict land and putting superstores on wherever they like!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you want England to remain red, white and blue please help on our petition - they could be turning your town blue and white under your nose before you know it!!!!
If we dont stop Tesco's obliterating our England in 10 years time you wont be able to turn a corner without seeing a Tesco's! Look at the previous petitions in various parts of the country and you will see they have  upset a lot of residents already. If you want to stop them coming to a town near you before its too late sign this petition now!! We must all fight them together, the more voices the louder the sounds!
